result.name: Old New Twitter
result.description: This theme tries to make the new Twitter design look less different from its previous design.The top bar is brought back and colors of things are made to match the older twitter. There is support for all default colour schemes. If you like it, please leave a positive rating. Contact me on My Twitter if you wish to suggest a change. Screenshots Dark Mode Profile Backgrounds Light Mode Lights Out Mode -Basically all languages are supported
result.notes:
Completed
- 01/07/2023 - More fixes

- 11/02/2023 - Fixes for twitter blue/communities buttons

- 05/11/2021 - First edit in a while, wanted to fix what they did to the follow buttons but couldn't do it in a way I was happy with while not breaking parts of the options menu...

- 05/04/2021 - Maintaining code

- 22/03/2021 - Maintaining code

- 25/02/2021 - Fixed bugs after twitter changed code

- 17/02/2021 - Fixed spacing of top bar navigation

- 18/01/2021 - Changed font sizes and added option to show trends

- 21/11/2020 - Fixed some issues that arose from twitter changing their code

- 16/07/2020 - Added a few small tweaks to the new DM mini view

- 16/06/2020 - Fixed some issues that arose from twitter changing their code

- 14/06/2020 - Fixed some bugs with images in DMs

- 13/06/2020 - Greatly improved appearance of people's profiles - Added account switcher button.

- 04/06/2020 - Fixed a few bugs - Added a few customizable options and polished some stuff.

- 02/06/2020 - Fixed a few bugs - Sorted the search bar - Got the colours to update responsively based on what you set in twitter's settings - Updated how twitter displays pop-out images - Made the top bar and timeline columns update responsively - Added in language support for all languages with right to left twitter layout.

- 18/08/2019 - Improved support for non English languages

- 16/08/2019 - Fixing issue where the search bar was hidden - Turn off top bar when screen isn't wide enough to display it

- 09/08/2019 - Adding the option to show or hide the explore button

- 25/07/2019 - Bugfixing and streamlining code

- 23/07/2019 - Lightmode / Black background support - fixed padding

- 22/07/2019 - Reduced maximum width when focused on images
